Text:
While I appreciate you putting this up here, I'll not be downloading it.

It's an album for it's time, and should sound as such.
that's the stupidest thing i've ever heard.

So many things I wanted to say in response to that statement.  Think I'll just agree with kcdkeel.

Thx for putting it up.  Sounds great.
